none: Lethal Aggression - From The Cunt Of The Fucking Whore demo 1985
From The Cunt Of The Fucking Whore demo 1985
Lethal Aggression - From The Cunt Of The Fucking Whore demo 1985

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on June 01, 2014 Description from Terminal Escape:
Mid '80s drug fueled nihilistic hardcore from New fucking Jersey. There is nothing even remotely subtle about these seven ragers - there's a little metal sneaking into the program, but it's in the context of screaming bloody mayhem...the title of this demo provides pretty good insight into where these dudes were coming from. These are not friendly sounds. FROM THE CUNT OF THE FUCKING WHORE New Jersey Drug Core
//1.bp.blogspot.com/-WhRB-jxTJJ4/U4tubdqBjKI/AAAAAAAAKD8/rZpLJMzJrHs/s1600/lethal+aggression+cover.jpg //3.bp.blogspot.com/-BuUKdVrsQ3I/U4uKsqAigAI/AAAAAAAAKEM/VeAPz_VcgfI/s1600/lethal+aggression+img.jpg
